channel.title: Gs mini game reward code

item.title: Gs mini game reward code
item.dc:creator: @nake nake
item.description:
@nake wrote:

where do i add this I know its in client.java but idk where cuz everytime i try i get and error here is the code if it helps

else if (useItemID == 601 && atObjectID == 4126) // reward { sendMessage( "Well done, you have just finished your mini game, here's your reward :)"); addSkillXP((486000000 * playerLevel[6]), 6); deleteItem(601, getItemSlot(601), 1); addItem(15333, 1); teleportToX = 2845; teleportToY = 4832; } else if (useItemID == 758 && atObjectID == 4126) // reward { sendMessage( "Well done, you have just finished your mini game, here's your reward :)"); addSkillXP((486000000 * playerLevel[6]), 6); deleteItem(758, getItemSlot(758), 1); addItem(15334, 1); teleportToX = 2845; teleportToY = 4832; } else if (useItemID == 788 && atObjectID == 4126) // reward { sendMessage( "Well done, you have just finished your mini game, here's your reward :)"); addSkillXP((486000000 * playerLevel[6]), 6); deleteItem(788, getItemSlot(788), 1); addItem(15335, 1); teleportToX = 2845; teleportToY = 4832; } else if (useItemID == 983 && atObjectID == 4126) // reward { sendMessage( "Well done, you have just finished your mini game, here's your reward :)"); addSkillXP((486000000 * playerLevel[6]), 6); deleteItem(983, getItemSlot(983), 1); addItem(15336, 1); teleportToX = 2845; teleportToY = 4832; }

Read full topic
